definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The accused asserted that he had been framed up.
sentences.chinese: 被告宣稱他是被誣害的。

sentences.english: Behold, I know your thoughts, and the devices which ye wrongfully imagine against me.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你們的意思，並誣害我的計謀。
